name: Cattery Smash
description:
Very simple speedrunning game where you try to break all 12 pots in the level you spawn in as fast as possible

Sorry for lack of gameplay - on a bit of a time crunch

WASD to move, J to swipe, R to restart, ESC to pause

(I also forgot to add a quit button so if you download the game just alt=tab + close the window)

(Fullscreen to see full UI)
